posts.post_content:
FS/T: T202 panels, featuring Cobb, Speaker, Walsh, McGraw, Chance, Evers, Collins, Baker.

Lot 1: Middle panels:
 
Ty Cobb [The famous slide that epitomized Cobb in his glory days!--Note: the little ragged edge on the right has come off--See new scan], $65--SOLD--
Speaker, Walsh, McGraw [2], Chance [2], Evers--$10 each,
Hal Chase, $7,
and the other 7 commons, $4 each.
 
End panels:
 
Walter Johnson [a beautiful piece, centered, no visible creases], $65--TRADED--
Eddie Collins, $20, SOLD
HR Baker ["5" written in pencil on back], SOLD
S/H $2 for the first card, free for all the rest.
  
No pm's, please; my box is full.  Post inquiries here, or you can email me at [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url]. 
  
Thanks. 
 
Doug
